item.title: 比特币下跌，看涨押注加速清算
item.description: 比特币跌至一周以来的最低水平，原因是全球金融市场避险情绪升温，引发了对加密货币的看涨押注清算。【原文：Bitcoin dropped to the lowest level in a week as a renewal of risk aversion in global financial markets triggered liquidations of bullish bets on the cryptocurrency.】

item.description: 铜矿石市场出现了前所未有的挤压，激发了投资者的看涨热情，并促使价格达到近两年来的最高点。【原文：An unprecedented squeeze in the market for copper ore has fired up bullish investors and helped drive prices to the highest in nearly two years.】

item.title: 安全公司 UL Solutions 首次公开募股 9.46 亿美元后大涨 23
item.description: UL Solutions 公司扩大首次公开募股规模，募集到 9.46 亿美元资金，随着上市复苏势头的不断增强，该公司股价最高攀升了 23%。【原文：UL Solutions Inc. shares climbed as much as 23% after the safety testing and inspection company’s expanded initial public offering raised $946 million, as the nascent recovery in listings continues to grow.】

item.title: 宠物关节炎药物报告发布后，Zoetis 跌幅创 17 个月来最大
item.description: Zoetis Inc.周五暴跌，因为一则新闻报道详细描述了该制药公司的动物关节炎药物的使用安全问题。【原文：Zoetis Inc. tumbled on Friday after a news report detailed safety concerns associated with the use of the pharmaceutical company’s arthritis drugs for animals.】

item.title: 法国 Altice 高级债权人寻求 6 个月合作协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在债务重组谈判之前，法国 Altice 公司的高级债权人正在将其利益与一份期限异常漫长的合作协议相协调。【原文：Altice France’s senior creditors are aligning their interests with an unusually long-dated cooperation agreement ahead of debt restructuring talks, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 华尔街四月售出的国债数量减少，因为税收季增加了美国的现金储备
item.description: 华尔街的策略师们预计，随着政府的税收收入不断增加，财政部将进一步缩减每月的钞票储备。【原文：Wall Street strategists are expecting the Treasury to shrink its monthly cache of bills even more as the government’s cash pile swells with tax receipts pouring in.】

item.title: 尼日利亚未售出石油开始积压，因为买家在等待时机
item.description: 尼日利亚 5 月份装船的原油到目前为止还迟迟找不到买家，半数以上的预定货物尚未清仓。【原文：Nigeria’s crude for May loading has been very slow to find buyers so far, with more than half of the scheduled cargoes yet clear.】

item.title: 美国大银行通过放贷赚取更多利润的牛市论调不攻自破
item.description: 最近几个月，投资者大举买入美国最大银行的股票，希望美联储缓慢降息能保持利润增长，但现在他们正在接受现实的检验。【原文：Investors who plowed into shares of the largest US banks in recent months, hoping that slow Federal Reserve rate cuts would keep goosing profits, are getting a reality check.】

item.title: 美联储重新思考，避险需求增加，美元创 18 个月来最佳表现
item.description: 美国经济的强劲和世界上交易量最大货币的相对安全刺激美元创下一年半以来的最大单周涨幅。【原文：The strength of the US economy and the relative safety of the world’s most traded currency stoked the dollar toward its biggest weekly gain in more than a year and a half.】

item.title: 奇货通讯开关设备短缺说明了很多经济问题
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读《奇货》周刊，乔-魏森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）将为您带来他们对市场、金融和经济领域最有趣发展的看法。【原文：Hello and welcome to the weekly Odd Lots newsletter, where Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway bring you their thoughts on the most interesting developments in markets, finance and the economy.】

item.title: 荷兰壳牌集团发出气候呼吁，要求制定更严格的规则
item.description: 一个荷兰环保组织正在推动对具有里程碑意义的 2021 年法院要求壳牌公司减少碳排放的命令做出更严格的解释，试图将该公司对这一判决的上诉转化为对其有利的结果。【原文：A Dutch environmental group is pushing for a stricter interpretation of the landmark 2021 court order for Shell Plc to slash its carbon emissions, seeking to turn the company’s appeal of that verdict to its advantage.】

item.title: 俄罗斯积压的 Sokol 原油几乎全部运完
item.description: 12 月印度炼油厂停止接收俄罗斯索科尔原油后，积压的俄罗斯索科尔原油已从 2 月中旬高峰时的 1800 多万桶减少到仅 200 万桶。可能很快就会完全清空。【原文：The backlog of Russian Sokol crude that got stranded after Indian refiners stopped accepting the cargoes in December has dwindled to just two million barrels, down from a peak of more than 18 million in mid-February. It may soon clear completely.】

item.title: 麦格理和加拿大养老金公司是印度公路资产的竞标者之一
item.description: 据知情人士透露，麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）和加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）支持的一家投资信托公司是印度准主权基础设施基金购买公路资产的入围竞标者之一。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd. and an investment trust backed by the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board are among short-listed bidders to buy road assets from India’s quasi-sovereign infrastructure fund, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 莫迪的医疗记录遭权威医学杂志抨击
item.description: 柳叶刀》杂志称，印度在总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）领导下的医疗保健记录每况愈下，政府缺乏可信的数据阻碍了政策的制定。【原文：India’s health care record under Prime Minister Narendra Modi has deteriorated and the government’s lack of credible data is hindering policy making, The Lancet said.】

item.title: 埃弗顿俱乐部与 777 公司就 4.52 亿美元的租借谈判陷入困境
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，投资公司 777 Partners 已在最后一刻举行了谈判，以帮助其为收购英超埃弗顿俱乐部提供资金。【原文：Investment firm 777 Partners has held last-minute talks to help fund its takeover of the Premier League’s Everton FC, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 贝莱德的拉里-芬克预计美联储将在 2024 年降息一两次
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）表示，他预计美联储今年最多会降息两次，央行将很难抑制通货膨胀。【原文：BlackRock Inc. Chief Executive Officer Larry Fink said he expects the Federal Reserve to cut rates twice at the most this year, and that it will be difficult for the central bank to curb inflation.】

item.title: 法国希望重振铜矿开采并加快绿色项目进程
item.description: 法国计划采取措施振兴铜矿开采，加快锂和地热能源项目，以帮助减少对进口的依赖，实现气候目标。【原文：France plans measures to revive copper mining and speed up lithium and geothermal energy projects to help reduce dependency on imports and hit climate targets.】

item.title: 拉塔姆航空公司摆脱破产后寻求发展
item.description: 总部位于圣地亚哥的拉美航空集团公司（Latam Airlines Group SA）在退出破产程序 17 个月后，对自己的财务状况有了足够的信心，可以寻求新的交易，并宣布 "对机会持开放态度"。【原文：Seventeen months after exiting bankruptcy proceedings, Santiago-based Latam Airlines Group SA is feeling confident enough with its finances to seek new transactions and declare itself “open to opportunities,” according to its top executive.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为，如果收益率上升，高等级需求有回落风险
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）分析师表示，即使风险溢价仍处于两年多来最紧张的水平，美国高等级债券收益率的攀升也可能导致投资者撤出该资产类别。【原文：Climbing US high-grade yields may cause investors to move out of the asset class, even as risk premiums remain at the tightest levels in over two years, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co. analysts.】

item.title: 以色列防备伊朗袭击，石油价格升至十月高点
item.description: 有消息称，以色列正在为可能来自伊朗的袭击做准备，石油价格因此跃升至 10 月份以来的最高点。【原文：Oil jumped to the highest price since October on news that Israel is bracing for a possible attack from Iran.】

item.title: 加密货币公司贝拉钱称融资额增至 1 亿美元
item.description: 由使用小熊主题昵称的化名创始人创办的区块链平台 Berachain 获得了 1 亿美元的融资，比之前报道的数字高出约 45%。【原文：Berachain, the blockchain platform started by pseudonymous founders who use bear-themed nicknames, secured $100 million in funding, or about 45% higher than previously reported.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势刺激避险需求，国债大涨
item.description: 由于中东战事升级的预期刺激了避险需求，周五国债大幅反弹，将收益率从年内高点附近拉回。【原文：Treasuries rallied sharply Friday, pulling yields from near year-to-date highs, as anticipated escalation of Middle East warfare stoked demand for havens.】

item.title: 美国立法者计划将非洲贸易协定《非洲增长和机会法》延长至 2041 年
item.description: 美国参议员提出一项议案，将美国与大约 40 个撒哈拉以南非洲国家的贸易计划延长至 2041 年，帮助这些国家继续免税进入世界最大的经济体。【原文：US senators introduced a bill to extend the nation’s trade program with about 40 sub-Saharan African nations until 2041, helping them maintain duty-free access to the world’s biggest economy.】

item.title: 印度 3 月通胀因食品成本下降而降温
item.description: 由于食品和燃料价格下降，印度 3 月份的零售通胀有所缓解，但即将到来的热浪可能会破坏农作物，并有可能刺激价格上涨。【原文：India’s retail inflation eased in March due to a decline in food and fuel prices, though a coming heat wave threatens to damage crops and risks stoking prices.】

item.title: 罗布斯塔咖啡创历史新高，短缺担忧加剧
item.description: 罗布斯塔咖啡在伦敦攀升至历史新高，因为市场担心产量下降将加剧咖啡豆短缺。阿拉比卡品种也出现反弹，可可接近近期的历史高点。【原文：Robusta coffee climbed to a fresh record in London on worries that poorer output will fuel bean shortages. The arabica variety also rallied and cocoa neared its recent all-time high.】
